body:
Comment 5: 
More information. Here are dumps of 3 different executables:

C:\>dumpbin c:\mingw.exe
Microsoft (R) COFF/PE Dumper Version 9.00.21022.08
Copyright (C) Microsoft Corporation.  All rights reserved.


Dump of file c:\mingw.exe

File Type: EXECUTABLE IMAGE

  Summary

        1000 .bss
        1000 .data
        1000 .debug_abbrev
        1000 .debug_aranges
        1000 .debug_frame
        1000 .debug_info
        1000 .debug_line
        1000 .debug_pubnames
        1000 .idata
        1000 .rdata
        1000 .text

C:\>dumpbin c:\go_no_debug.exe
Microsoft (R) COFF/PE Dumper Version 9.00.21022.08
Copyright (C) Microsoft Corporation.  All rights reserved.


Dump of file c:\go_no_debug.exe

File Type: EXECUTABLE IMAGE

  Summary

      417000 .data
        1000 .idata
       84000 .text

C:\>dumpbin c:\go_with_debug.exe
Microsoft (R) COFF/PE Dumper Version 9.00.21022.08
Copyright (C) Microsoft Corporation.  All rights reserved.


Dump of file c:\go_with_debug.exe

File Type: EXECUTABLE IMAGE

LINK : fatal error LNK1000: Internal error during DumpSections

  Version 9.00.21022.08

  ExceptionCode            = C0000005
  ExceptionFlags           = 00000000
  ExceptionAddress         = 00426C80 (00400000) "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 9.0\VC\BIN\link.exe"
  NumberParameters         = 00000002
  ExceptionInformation[ 0] = 00000000
  ExceptionInformation[ 1] = 00000004

CONTEXT:
  Eax    = 42000000  Esp    = 0012E530
  Ebx    = 011A3AE0  Ebp    = 0012E558
  Ecx    = 00000004  Esi    = 00000004
  Edx    = 0040406C  Edi    = 0000014C
  Eip    = 00426C80  EFlags = 00010246
  SegCs  = 0000001B  SegDs  = 00000023
  SegSs  = 00000023  SegEs  = 00000023
  SegFs  = 0000003B  SegGs  = 00000000
  Dr0    = 00000000  Dr3    = 00000000
  Dr1    = 00000000  Dr6    = 00000000
  Dr2    = 00000000  Dr7    = 00000000

C:\>

where

c:\mingw.exe is mingw gcc generated;
c:\go_no_debug.exe is go, with "8l /s ..."
c:\go_with_debug.exe is go, with "8l ..."

So, the problem is with 8l, but only when it generates dwarf sections. On the other hand
mingw dwarf sections are OK, they are also more then 8 chars long, so the problem is
somewhere else. It is hard to know where, because we can't look at the source.

Alex
